channel.title: Stretchy NPCs
channel.description:
I was adding pets into my server, I realised that they were all stretchy and glitchy, I was wondering if anyone knew how to fix this? I assume it's a client problem to do with one of my cache's files. If you could just tell me which one it is, I could fix it. (It's not called NPC btw, I've tried finding that file in my cache, I don't use it apparently.)
I looked around for fixed on Google, for things like "Stretchy NPC fix PI" and others like that. None.
Here's an example picture of what I mean:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2i8ddgw.jpg[/img]

item.title: Stretchy NPCs
